mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_NO, IT.IMG_NAME, I.ITEM_NAME, I.ITEM_PRICE, I.ITEM_INFO, I.ITEM_IMAGE, I.BRAND, M.PAYMENT FROM ITEM I LEFT JOIN PAY P ON I.ITEM_NO = P.ITEM_NO LEFT JOIN ITEM_IMAGEFILE IT ON I.ITEM_NO = IT.ITEM_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON P.PAYMENT = M.PAYMENT WHERE M.M_IDX = #{m_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY (M_IDX, ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_INFO, ITEM_STOCK, BU_NO, BRAND, READHIT, PAYMENT) VALUES (SEQ_M_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{item_no}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_info}, #{item_stock}, #{bu_no}, #{brand}, #{readhit}, #{payment} )
